thread.title: Indian eatery Bol in Midtown Houston pushes opening to early 2025
thread.title_full: Indian eatery Bol in Midtown Houston pushes opening to early 2025

author: Asia Armour
title: Indian eatery Bol in Midtown Houston pushes opening to early 2025
text:
Amrinain The Woodlands and the
newly openedPok Pok Po in Houston, are opening another Houston Midtown concept called
Bolin early 2025.
The details
Previously estimatedto welcome diners in fall 2024, a late December news release confirmed the postponed opening date for the new Indian restaurant from
Kahani Social Groupis now Jan. 30.
What to expect
The menu will pay homage to the flavors of Indian cuisine and highlight a variety of grilled meats, vegetables and grains paired with house-made hummus, sauces and dressings. Diners will also be able to mix-and-match flavors, sustainably-sourced meats and fresh produce from local farms in a single-serve bowl, per the release.
Also of note
Bol will occupy half of the Pok Pok Po restaurant on Louisiana Street. The eatery joins Midtown Houston's "bustling culinary hub," alongside JINYA Ramen Bar, Gen Korean BBQ and Piolaâ€™s, according to the release.
- Opening Jan. 30
- 3201 Louisiana St., Ste. 108, Houston
- Instagram:
@bolkitchen
